newsitem.title: UK: BOE forecasts 700 mln stg shortage, offers help.
newsitem.headline: BOE forecasts 700 mln stg shortage, offers help.

text.p: The Bank of England offered the UK money market an early round of assistance after forecasting a liquidity shortage of around 700 million stg.
The Bank invited money market operators to offer band 1 and 2 bills.
